name: 03-recipe-implementing-your-module
description: In this application, we're going to start writing our module code. The module we will write will expose a single API that will reverse a sentence pass to it. We'll also install a popular code formatter to keep our module code consistent.
author: Elom Atsou Agboka <opentech.consult@gmail.com> (https://github.com/OpenTechConsult)
